xdi2.core.impl.json.bdb

Class BDBJSONStore

  • java.lang.Object
    • xdi2.core.impl.json.AbstractJSONStore
      • xdi2.core.impl.json.bdb.BDBJSONStore
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JSONStore

    public class BDBJSONStore
extends AbstractJSONStore
implements JSONStore
    This class is used by the BDBJSONGraphFactory class to create JSON based graphs stored in BDB.
    Author:
    markus
